html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06682021-07-01
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of ANN MACKENZIE of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Sharon Elizabeth Sparkes, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of ANN MACKENZIE of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Sharon Elizabeth Sparkes, whose term has expired.
